entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
